roleset.name: not characteristic of "America"
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I vote ' for ' the best candidate for the job , regardless of political affiliation -LRB- unless , of course , they are un-American , like Libtards and Neocons -RRB- .

example.text: Providing Health Care For Seniors and Veterans Is 'Unamerican and Grounded In 'Socialism'
